thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com | 15 of 3524
thread.title: Barbara Johnson
thread.title_full: Thrift Books reviewed by Barbara Johnson

author: Barbara Johnson
title: Barbara Johnson
text:
I like knowing I'm helping keep some books out of the land fills and they are of good used quality. The books always arrive quickly and in good shape. Thank you for what you do. Some of the books I have ordered I would not be able to afford otherwise. Once again thank you for a job well done
Sincerely
Barbara Johnson
